name: Bird Boys: a game of sidekicks and positive masculinity.
name_original: Bird Boys: a game of sidekicks and positive masculinity.
description:
Bird Boys is a game about a group of young men (or at least people with masculine presentation) who are sidekicks of the same mentor. It’s a game about deriving power from yourself, your kindness and values, and each other. 

Bird Boys is heavily inspired by Heart and Lightning by Ben Chong (@swordsnflowers), Robin from DC comics, and Todd McCuen from Planned Obsolescence (GMed by @ccdash2224 and originally streamed on twitch.tv/katyfaise)
